title.narrative: Renewable Energy for the Metropolitan Area

description.narrative: It focuses on off-grid distributed renewable energy, with a view to support private sector solutions (e.g. village grids, standalone systems for productive and community uses and solar home systems for households) in areas not served by y EDH.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
